/****** Object:  Table [dbo].[COMPANY]    Script Date: 10/12/2022 4:42:08 PM ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO

SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO

CREATE TABLE [dbo].[COMPANY](
	[COMPANY_ID] [int] NOT NULL,
	[NAME] [nvarchar](250) NULL,
	[ADDRESS_LINE1] [nvarchar](100) NULL,
	[CITY] [nvarchar](25) NULL,
	[POSTAL_CODE] [nvarchar](15) NULL,
	[PHONE] [nvarchar](20) NULL,
	[FAX] [nvarchar](20) NULL,
	[EMAIL] [nvarchar](100) NULL,
	[HOME_PAGE] [nvarchar](1024) NULL,
	[DEFAULT_CONTRACT_ID] [int] NULL,
	[CONTRACT_REMINDER_LEVEL] [int] NULL,
	[LIST] [bit] NULL,
	[CONTRACT_EXPIRES] [datetime] NULL,
	[CONTRACT_SW] [bit] NULL,
	[DESCRIPTION] [varchar](8000) NULL,
	[DIRECTIONS] [varchar](8000) NULL,
	[DAYS_TO_PAY] [numeric](6, 0) NULL,
	[FEE_PERCENTAGE] [real] NULL,
	[CONTRACTOR_FEE_PERCENTAGE] [real] NULL,
	[FLAT_FEE] [money] NULL,
	[AD_SOURCE] [nvarchar](250) NULL,
	[HR_REP_ID] [int] NULL,
	[CONTRACT_NOTES] [varchar](8000) NULL,
	[MANAGERS_NOTES] [varchar](8000) NULL,
	[HR_NOTES] [varchar](8000) NULL,
	[REGION_ID] [int] NULL,
	[STATE] [nvarchar](25) NULL,
	[COUNTRY] [nvarchar](35) NULL,
	[DATE_ENTERED] [datetime] NOT NULL,
	[CONTRACT_SENT] [datetime] NULL,
	[INDUSTRY_SUB_ID] [int] NULL,
	[INDUSTRY] [nvarchar](50) NULL,
	[COMPANY_SUBM] [int] NULL,
	[COMPANY_INV] [int] NULL,
	[COMPANY_F_INT] [int] NULL,
	[COMPANY_OFFER] [int] NULL,
	[COMPANY_PLAC] [int] NULL,
	[COMPANY_BILLING] [money] NULL,
	[COMPANY_AVG_D] [real] NULL,
	[COMPANY_RATING] [real] NULL,
	[DUPGROUP] [nvarchar](5) NULL,
	[DUPFLAG] [nvarchar](5) NULL,
	[DUPFREQ] [nvarchar](5) NULL,
	[DONOTCALL] [bit] NULL,
	[VMS_SW] [bit] NULL,
	[BH_ID] [int] NULL,
	[OwnerID] [uniqueidentifier] NULL,
	[IsOwnershipPermanent] [bit] NULL,
	[IsAgreementRequired] [bit] NULL,
	[IsSummaryBilling] [bit] NOT NULL,
	[StatusID] [int] NOT NULL,
	[DefaultBillTo] [int] NULL,
	[LastNoteID] [bigint] NULL,
	[InvoiceBatchID] [int] NULL,
	[PaymentTermsID] [int] NULL,
	[TimesheetPeriodsRangeCalendarID] [int] NULL,
	[Timestamp] [varchar](100) NOT NULL,
	[FYEndDate] [int] NULL,
	[IsMergedTo] [int] NULL,
	[CompanyStatusChangedToActiveDate] [date] NULL,
	[OwnerEntityID] [uniqueidentifier] NULL,
	[AdsourceAdditionalInfo] [varchar](8000) NULL,
	[PrimaryPhone] [nvarchar](1000) NULL,
	[PrimaryPhoneTypeName] [nvarchar](100) NULL,
	[PrimaryEmail] [nvarchar](1000) NULL,
	[PrimaryEmailTypeName] [nvarchar](100) NULL,
	[AutoCreateTimesheets] [bit] NOT NULL,
	[CompanyTypeID] [int] NULL,
	[InvoiceTemplateID] [int] NULL,
	[OpportunityID] [bigint] NULL,
	[VMSBurdenID] [int] NULL,
	[ExpenseTypeID] [int] NULL,
	[SplitTimesheetsForMonthlyBilling] [bit] NOT NULL,
	[TimesheetCreationOption] [int] NOT NULL,
	[InvoiceTemplateIDPerm] [int] NULL,
	[TimesheetEntryTemplateID] [int] NULL,
	[DefaultContactID] [int] NULL,
	[EmailCC] [nvarchar](200) NULL,
	[NeedsIndexing] [bit] NOT NULL,
	[AllowEmptyTimesheets] [bit] NOT NULL,
	[ExternalVendorID] [nvarchar](50) NULL,
	[LoadVouchersAsOnHold] [bit] NOT NULL,
	[ARCollectorUserID] [uniqueidentifier] NULL,
	[CashOnAccount] [money] NOT NULL,
	[TimesheetRangeCalendarID] [int] NULL,
	[TimesheetBatchID] [int] NULL,
	[TimesheetNotificationOptions] [int] NULL,
	[DefaultAddressID] [bigint] NULL,
	[CreditScore] [nvarchar](50) NULL,
	[LegalName] [nvarchar](100) NULL,
	[CreditLimit] [float] NULL,
	[LateFeePercentage] [float] NULL,
	[ShowTimesheetBillingTotalToContact] [bit] NOT NULL,
	[InvoiceModeID] [int] NULL,
	[OvertimeTypeID] [int] NULL,
	[DefaultFolderGroupID] [int] NULL,
	[CancellationDays] [int] NULL,
	[AdminBurdenID] [int] NULL,
	[OvertimeMultiplier] [decimal](9, 4) NULL,
	[DoubletimeMultiplier] [decimal](9, 4) NULL,
	[DivisionMarketID] [int] NULL,
	[DefaultBillRateMarkupPercentage] [decimal](18, 6) NULL,
	[DefaultVendorRateMarkupPercentage] [decimal](18, 6) NULL,
	[DefaultRateHolidayListID] [int] NULL,
	[ContactPortalInfo] [varchar](8000) NULL,
	[InvoiceDiscountPercent] [decimal](22, 10) NULL,
	[CONTACT_ID_APPROVETIMESHEET] [int] NULL,
	[InvoiceTemplateIDMilestone] [int] NULL,
	[MilestoneTransactionTypeID] [int] NULL,
	[DefaultClientProjectID] [int] NULL,
	[VATID] [nvarchar](20) NULL,
	[CreatedBy] [uniqueidentifier] NULL,
	[RoutingFlagID] [int] NULL,
	[TLBillProcessingCalendarID] [int] NULL,
	[LastModifiedOn] [datetime] NULL,
	[PONumberRequiredOnTimesheetEntry] [bit] NOT NULL,
	[PONumberVisibleOnTimesheetEntry] [bit] NOT NULL,
	[DefaultCompanyPONumberID] [int] NULL,
	[SalesTaxExemptStates] [varchar](8000) NULL,
	[TimesheetBillRateMarginPercent] [decimal](5, 4) NULL,
	[AdSourceId] [int] NULL,
	[SourceSystemCode] VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
	LoadDate DATETIME NOT NULL,
	UpdateDate DATETIME NOT NULL
) 
WITH (Distribution = HASH(COMPANY_ID))
GO


ALTER TABLE [dbo].[COMPANY] ADD  CONSTRAINT [PK_COMPANY] PRIMARY KEY NONCLUSTERED 
(
	[COMPANY_ID] ASC,
	[UpdateDate] ASC
) NOT ENFORCED 
GO
